TI_TEXT.P: Транспортни услуги (с изключение на извозването на отпадъци)
Servicios de transporte (excluido el transporte de residuos)
Services de transport (à l'exclusion du transport des déchets)
Servizi di trasporto (escluso il trasporto di rifiuti)
Servizzi ta' trasport (eskluż it-trasport ta' l-iskart)
Serviços de transporte (excl. transporte de resíduos)
Servicii de transport (cu excepţia transportului de deşeuri)

SHORT_DESCR.P: The contracting authority, comprising Vest-Agder County and Agder kollektivtrafikk AS, invites tenderers to a tender competition for passenger transport services, including ordinary transport of pupils, individually adapted school transport services, with an option for TT-transport services to order.
The geographical area is divided into 7 driving areas, with separate awards of contract for Lillesand, Grimstad, Arendal, Tvedestrand, Risør, Gjerstad og Vegårshei.

The Contracting Authority, comprising Vest-Agder County and Agder kollektivtrafikk AS, invites tenderers to a tender competition for passenger transport services, including ordinary transport of pupils, individually adapted school transport services, with an option for TT-transport services to order.
The geographical area is divided into 7 driving areas, with separate awards of contract for Lillesand, Grimstad, Arendal, Tvedestrand, Risør, Gjerstad og Vegårshei.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Unilateral option for the Contracting Authority to extend the contract for a further 1/2 year until 30.6.2021, with an option to extend the contract for a further 1 year after this date. The maximum contract period is thus 30.6.2022.
If the Contracting Authority would like to take up the option, written notification must be given to the Tenderer 6 months before the option will come into force.

INFO_ADD.P: Each tenderer must document sufficient capacity for. The driving they would like to submit a tender for.

SUITABILITY.P: Requirement: Tenderers must have submitted their tax assignments and paid their taxes and employer contributions.
The certificate must not be older than 3 months from the tender deadline.
Requirement: Tenderers must have submitted their assignments and paid VAT.
The certificate must not be older than 3 months from the tender deadline.

Requirement: Tenderers must vouch for the fact that the company works systematically to comply with health, environment and safety legislation and satisfies the internal control regulations. Documentation: HSE self-declaration.
Requirement: Completed and signed confidentiality declaration.
Requirement: Tenderers must be a legally established company.

If a tenderer submits a tender on behalf of a group of tenders, documentation shall be attached confirming that the tenderer can commit the other tenderers by submitting a tender on their behalf and possibly sign a contract if one is awarded.
Original proxy statements from each company that is a member of the group must be attached to the tender together with the company registration certificate.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Tenderers must have the necessary permits to carry out the assignment.
Tenderers must document that they fulfil the terms for providing passenger transport stated in the regulations dated 26.3.2003 nº 401 on domestic professional transport by motor vehicle and vessel.
Tenderers must have experience from individually adapted transport.

An overview of relevant assignments with a short description of the delivery. Any newly established companies can, instead of this, have a key person who has been part of an equivalent assignment. In such cases, the Contracting Authority would also like information (CV) on what role the key person had in the assignments.
